name: Cult Convert CHAOS
description:
THE END IS NEAR! You are a cult leader who knows the world is going to end (this time, you are right!). Convert as many people as possible before time runs out. Now is the time to rise up...to space.

Controls:

Arrow keys/W, A ,S ,D- move

Mouse cursor- point in direction to move to

Right Click- to shoot

This is was a  two week group prototype for the prototyping class at the University of Texas at Austin.  It was created by  Darwin Henderson, Henry Gammad, Miguel Angel, and Alexia Carmona.  We decided to create this game to present the theme of unique characters in a game with the aspect of quests as well as different cult members.
